item.title: Qodo’s fully autonomous agent tackles the complexities of regression testing
item.description: The new autonomous Qodo Cover agent creates extensive validation suites to ensure software applications are, essentially, behaving.

item.title: The biggest news from Amazon Web Services (AWS) re:Invent 2024
item.description: The most important news for business leaders and those looking to embrace and deploy the latest, most useful AWS technology.

item.title: Growl is an AI interactive boxing coach to punch up your family workouts
item.description: Growl has raised $4.75 million to create an AI-powered interactive boxing coach to punch up your family workouts.

item.title: Google Cloud launches Veo AI video generator model on Vertex
item.description: Unveiled at Google’s I/O developer conference, Veo is Google DeepMind’s response to competitors like Runway’s Gen-3 and OpenAI's Sora.

item.title: AWS and Riot Games name winner of Valorant Champions Tour Hackathon
item.description: AWS and Riot Games have revealed the winners of their Valorant Champions Tour Hackathon: Esports Manager Challenge.
